Digital Audio Effects

DSP programming in Faust

  • Home
  • works
  • Digital Audio Effects
1 June 2015

Skills

  • Audio programming

This section contains various Digital Signal Processing algorithms implemented in the functional audio language Faust

Binaural Shift

An experimental effects processor for playing with two pitch shifted signals that pan periodically. Code here.

Voice Formant synth

Implementation of formant synthesis for generating human-like (vocal synthesis). Code here.

Slicer + Distortion

A guitar effect with distortion and a slicer based on the interference of two pulse trains. Code here.
